description: The overstuffed sofa is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting and and flexible polyurethane foam over a frame made from oriented strand board (OSB).
short desc: The overstuffed sofa is a common furniture item upholstered with polyester (PET) fabric over polyester (PET) batting and and flexible polyurethane foam over a frame made from oriented strand board (OSB).
source: Sofas were purchased from a national furniture manufacturer and distributor.

measured property.test description: Schmidt-Boelter heat flux gauges were oriented to face the centerline of the furniture item at distances of 0.5 m, 1.0 m, 1.5 m, and 2.0 m from the face of the furniture item.
The temperature at the centerline of the furniture item was measured with type K thermocouples at elevations of 2.47 m, 3.47 m, and 4.47 m above the floor.
The vertical velocity at the centerline of the furniture item was measured with bi-directional probes at elevations of 2.47 m, 3.47 m, and 4.47 m above the floor.
